ValidationRule.description: This will prevent Users from updating the Stage of a Deal that is Rejected, Withdrawn or Paid Off
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Profile.Name == "System Administrator"), NOT($Profile.Name == "Integration"), ISCHANGED(StageName), OR( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName), "Withdrawn"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName), "Rejected"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName), "Paid Off") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Stage with Withdrawn, Rejected or Paid Off Deal cannot be re-opened. If you would like have the Deal re-opened by the IT Team, please email the request to support@cvest.com. Approval may need to be requested from management and the head of Originations
